translation.en: You had rations for two weeks.
You were inside for nearly four months.
How long did you think you were inside?
translation.ko: 본인은 안에 얼마나 있었던 것 같아요?

translation.en: Like all cells, it is born from an existing cell.
translation.ko: 모든 세포는 기존에 존재하는 세포에서 태어나죠

translation.en: all cells were ultimately born from one cell.
translation.ko: 모든 세포는 하나의 세포에서 만들어진 거죠

translation.en: A single organism alone on planet Earth,
one became two, two became four.
translation.ko: 하나가 둘이 되고 둘이 넷이 되어

translation.en: The rhythm of the dividing pair...
which becomes the structure of every microbe,
blade of grass, sea creature, land creature...
translation.ko: 식물, 해양 및 육상 생물이 되고

translation.en: The structure of everything that lives...
As students of medicine, as the doctors of tomorrow,
this is where you come in.
The cell we're looking at is from a tumor.
translation.ko: 우리가 보고 있는 것은 종양 세포예요

translation.en: Female patient, early 30s, taken from the cervix.
Over the course of the next term,
we will be closely examining cancer cells in vitro

translation.ko: 자가 소화 작용에 대해 알아볼 거예요

translation.en: [Katie] I read the John Sulston paper last night.
I still feel like I'm not working hard enough.
-They find everything easier. -[woman] You aren't, and they don't.
[Dan] I've been looking for you at lunch, but you never seem to be around.
I've been catching up on some writing.
All work and no play, it sounds... not healthy.
translation.ko: 일만 하고 놀지는 않고 몸에 안 좋아요

translation.en: Sarah and I have a few people over.
translation.ko: 세라랑 같이 집에 몇 명 초대했거든요

translation.en: A garden party while the weather holds.
translation.ko: 날씨 좋을 때 정원 파티 어떨까 해서요

translation.en: Thanks, Dan, I really appreciate it, but I'm going to paint our bedr--
translation.ko: 댄, 정말 고맙지만 우리 침실 페인트 작업을...

translation.en: You're allowed to come to a barbecue. It is not a betrayal
translation.ko: 바비큐 파티에 간다고 누가 뭐라고 안 해요 그 사람 추억에 대한 배신도 모욕도 아니라고요

translation.en: or an insult to his memory.
translation.ko: 그 사람 추억에 대한 배신도 모욕도 아니라고요

translation.en: -♪ Confusion has its cost ♪ -Oh, my God. Oh, my God!
-♪ Who lingers ♪ -Oh, my God. I thought you were gone. ♪ Saying she is lost ♪
No one knew anything about your unit.
translation.ko: 당신 부대에 대해 아는 사람이 한 명도 없었어

translation.en: The other partners knew just as little as me.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들도 나만큼 아는 게 없더라

translation.en: Okay, yeah, it was covert. Yeah, I think so.
I-- I don't know where it was, or...
How is that possible? [stammers] Was it warm?
Did the people there speak Portuguese, or Swahili, or Pashto?
How long have you been back?
How'd you get back? What base did you fly into?
translation.ko: 어떻게 돌아왔어? 어느 부대로 들어온 거야?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Your unit, did they come back with you?
You must be able to tell me something.
You vanished off the face of the earth for 12 months.
I deserve a better explanation than no explanation.
translation.ko: 무슨 말이라도 해줘야 하는 거 아냐?

translation.en: No, I was outside the room.
Stay with me, baby. -[coughing] -I'm right here with you.
translation.ko: 여보, 정신 차려 나 여기 있어

translation.en: Stay with me, baby. I love you.
Baby, look at me. Can you do something?!
translation.ko: 여보, 날 봐 어떻게 좀 해 봐요!

translation.en: [paramedic] You call for a police escort?
[paramedic] What are you doing? You can't move him!
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거예요? 움직이면 안 돼요

translation.en: Let him go! Let him go!
It's a hangover from the sedative you were given.
Why am I talking to a psychologist?
translation.ko: 제가 왜 심리학자와 얘기를 해야 하죠?

translation.en: Am I in a psychiatric hospital?
You served in the military for seven years.
I'm a professor from Johns Hopkins.
I want to know what the fuck I'm doing here.
Your research area is the genetically programmed life cycle of a cell.
translation.ko: 연구 분야가 세포 주기의 유전 프로그래밍이죠

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like to talk about Sergeant Kane.
When did he arrive back home?
-I want to see a lawyer. -You're not gonna be able to.
Did he explain how he got back?
-No. -Did he contact you at any point
translation.ko: - 아니요 - 집에 없는 동안 한 번이라도

translation.en: [Ventress] What did he tell you about his mission when he returned?

translation.ko: - 아무 말도 안 했어요 - 떠나기 전에는요?

translation.en: Did he ever mention where he was going, what he was doing?
translation.ko: 어디에 가는지 뭐 하러 가는지 얘기하던가요?

translation.en: He never said, I never asked.
translation.ko: 말한 적도 없고 물은 적도 없어요

translation.en: But you made regular requests for information from his unit CO.
Until six months ago, and then you stopped.
Why was that? Thought he was dead?
It's not easy to move on.
I'm done answering questions. It's your turn.
translation.ko: 난 답할 만큼 했어요 이제 당신 차례예요

translation.en: He must have been exposed to some sort of radiation,
You have to tell me where he was, what he was doing.
translation.ko: 그이가 어디서 뭘 하다 온 건지 말해요

translation.en: It started around three years ago.
Blackwater National Park reported that a lighthouse was surrounded
One of the wardens went in to investigate.
Since then, we've approached by land, by sea,
translation.ko: 그 이후로 육로 및 해상으로 접근해 보고

translation.en: sent in drones, animals, and teams of people.
translation.ko: 드론, 동물, 사람들 다 동원해 봤지만

translation.en: And the boundary's getting bigger. It's expanding.
translation.ko: 오히려 경계가 늘어나고 있어요 확장하고 있죠

translation.en: So far, it's eating into barely populated swampland,
which, you know, we evacuated under the pretext of a chemical spill,
translation.ko: 화학품 유출을 핑계로 모두 대피시킨 상태죠

translation.en: but... that won't last much longer.
In a few months, the area will have grown to where we are right now.
translation.ko: 몇 달 후면 우리가 있는 곳까지 퍼질 거예요

translation.en: We need to come to an agreement about what to do with you.
translation.ko: 당신을 어떻게 할 건지 결정해야 해요

translation.en: You're not going to let me go home?
Is that what you want? To go home?
translation.ko: 원하는 게 그거예요? 집에 돌아가는 것?

translation.en: I want to be with him.
I was just looking at the moon.
It's always so weird seeing it like that in the daylight.
translation.ko: 대낮에 저렇게 보이는 게 항상 이상했어
현관 불 끄는 걸 깜빡한 것처럼 말이야

translation.en: somewhat key to the whole "being a god" thing.
You know he's listening right now, don't you?
circumvent the Hayflick limit, you can prevent senescence.
translation.ko: 헤이플릭 한계를 피하면 노쇠를 방지할 수 있어

translation.en: I was about to make the exact same point.
It means the cell doesn't grow old, it becomes immortal.
translation.ko: 세포가 노화하지 않는다는 말이야 불멸이 된다고

translation.en: They say aging is a natural process, but it's actually a fault in our genes.
translation.ko: 노화는 사실 자연스러운 현상이 아니고 유전자의 결함이거든

translation.en: I get really turned on when you patronize me. It's really hot.
Without it, I could keep looking like this forever.
translation.ko: 그것만 아니라면 나는 영원히 지금 모습을 유지할 수 있어

translation.en: Oh, okay. -Well, that could constitute a mistake. -[laughs]
translation.ko: 그래, 그럼 신이 실수한 거 맞네

translation.en: You didn't tell me where you're heading this time.
translation.ko: 이번에 어디 가는지 말 안 해줬어

translation.en: I know there's something strange about this mission.
translation.ko: 이번 작전은 다른 때랑 다른 거 알아

translation.en: The silence around it is louder than usual.
Kind of angling for a clue here.
We'll be under the same hemisphere.
It tells you that if you step outside and you look up...
we'll be looking at the same stars.
translation.ko: 같은 별을 바라보고 있을 거란 얘기지

translation.en: You think that's what I do while you're away?
translation.ko: 당신 없는 동안 내가 그러고 있을 줄 알았나 보지?

translation.en: -What? -You think I'm out in the garden,
pining, looking up at the sky?
-[scoffs] Shut up. All right. -Oh, to think my beloved Kane...
translation.ko: - 됐어, 알았어 - 어머, 저런 - 내 사랑하는 케인은... - 알았다고

translation.en: -Okay. Uh-huh. -...is looking at the selfsame moon.
translation.ko: - 내 사랑하는 케인은... - 알았다고 나와 같은 달님을 바라보고 있겠지요

translation.en: Jesus. You know what? You are disrespectful,
seriously, not only to your former comrades in the armed forces,
-but also to the president. -You forgot the flag.
Oh, I'm getting-- I'm getting to the motherfucking flag.
[woman] She's all by herself. Don't you think we should make friends?
translation.ko: 혼자 있는데 친구 해줘야 하지 않을까요?

translation.en: -[woman 2] Well, obviously you should. -[woman] Yep, I'll do it.
You know, I always see you here alone. It's...
I'm guessing you probably feel weird or awkward.
The people here put themselves to sleep in the fetal position
translation.ko: 여기 사람들 잘 때는 다 배 속 아기처럼 자요

translation.en: Um, why don't you come and meet my crew?
[Lena and woman] Hi nice to meet you.
Yeah, that's Cassie Sheppard, and Josie Radek.
-[Cassie] Do you want to have a seat? -Thank you.
-So, first day at the Southern Reach. -Yes.
Um, yeah, right from the start.
I've been testing the magnetic fields around the boundary,
which is like using confetti to test a hurricane.
translation.ko: 꽃가루로 태풍 실험하겠다는 것과 같은 이치긴 하지만요

translation.en: Uh, and I've been here... ten months.
Tried to join an NGO, but my application got flagged,
Only two months. I'm a physicist.
translation.ko: 전 2달밖에 안 됐어요 물리학자예요, 케임브리지 포닥 끝나자마자 왔어요

translation.en: I came straight from my Cambridge postdoc.
Uh, I'm from Johns Hopkins, biologist.
We had a bet on your profession, and Josie had biologist, of course.
translation.ko: 직업을 알아맞혀 봤는데 조시가 생물학자일 거라 했어요

translation.en: -I had law enforcement. -I had you as single.
translation.ko: - 전 경찰이라고 했고 - 전 싱글이라고 했어요

translation.en: Jesus. Do you have to hit on everyone, like all the time?
translation.ko: 보는 사람마다 다 대시해야 직성이 풀려요?

translation.en: I think I'm allowed to roll the dice a few more times. [chuckles]
Well, yeah, um, crazy as it seems...
-You're going into the Shimmer? -Six days and counting.
The previous teams have been largely military, so, yeah.
What do you think happened to them?
Well, there are two theories of what went wrong in the Shimmer.
translation.ko: 쉬머에서 일어난 일에 대해 두 가지 이론이 있죠

translation.en: Two, they go crazy and kill each other.
translation.ko: 둘째, 모두 정신이 나가서 서로 죽였다

translation.en: [Josie] There was one military guy who made it out.
translation.ko: 빠져나온 군인이 한 명 있긴 해요

translation.en: Yeah, but you heard about the state that he was in.
I know why you went in.
And I know what I have to do.
translation.ko: 이제 내가 뭘 해야 하는지 알겠어

translation.en: [Ventress] So you didn't tell them about your connection to Sergeant Kane?
[Lena] I thought it would complicate things.
Why are you going into the Shimmer?
The mission statement is to reach the supposed source of the Shimmer,
translation.ko: 작전에 그렇게 명시되어 있어요 쉬머의 근원으로 추정되는 등대에 접근해서

translation.en: the lighthouse, enter and acquire data, and return.
translation.ko: 쉬머의 근원으로 추정되는 등대에 접근해서 정보를 수집하고 돌아오는 것이 목표예요

translation.en: But I don't think that that's your mission statement.
I've been watching the phenomenon for a while now.

translation.ko: 빛이 점점 다가오는 걸 지켜보고만 있죠

translation.en: There's only so long one can do that.
But you need to know what's inside?
translation.ko: 안에 뭐가 있는지 알고 싶은 건가요?

translation.en: You want to come with us.
I can't do anything for him here.
translation.ko: 여기서는 남편을 위해 할 수 있는 것이 없어요

translation.en: You requested to join the mission.
You knew all other missions had failed
translation.ko: 이전 작전이 모두 실패한 걸 알고 있었죠

translation.en: and the only survivor was barely surviving.
translation.ko: 유일한 생존자는 목숨만 연명하고 있는 상태였고요

translation.en: I'm only trying to understand what drove you.
[Anya] And then we get some real meals.

translation.ko: 스파게티예요 여기 라덱이 가져온 채소 크래커요

translation.en: Wow, cornbread. That's not so bad.
You gotta give me a second. I'm a little disoriented.
You don't remember setting up camp, do you?
translation.ko: 텐트 친 거 기억 안 나죠?

translation.en: I don't remember anything... after we reached the tree line.
translation.ko: 숲속으로 들어온 이후 아무 기억이 없어요

translation.en: And we did a food inventory.
From the depletion, we've been out here for at least three or four days.
translation.ko: 먹은 양으로 봐서 3-4일 정도 있었던 것 같아요

translation.en: Guys, I've been checking my comms and nav equipment.
They boot up fine, no problem with the electronics,
translation.ko: 전원은 켜지는 걸 보니 전자 장치 문제는 아니에요

translation.en: but anything that sends a signal out of the Shimmer... is down.
translation.ko: 그런데 쉬머 외부로 신호를 보내는 장치는 작동이 안 돼요

translation.en: Even though we've probably got about 20 satellites above us right now,
translation.ko: 우리 위로 띄운 위성만 20개가 넘을 텐데

translation.en: So we've got no compass, no comms, no coordinates...
translation.ko: 나침반도 없고 통신도 안 잡히고 좌표도 없는 거네요

translation.en: Well, we know we're in the state park.
We head south, we hit the ocean,
then we can just follow the shoreline until we hit the perimeter wall. Right?
translation.ko: 거기서부터는 해안을 따라가면 돌아갈 수 있어요

translation.en: -How do we know what's south? -Come on, Josie, you know this.
Split the difference between the hour hand and 12, south.
translation.ko: 시침과 12시 사이를 반으로 나누면 이쪽이 남쪽이네요

translation.en: We weren't really expecting the comms equipment to work, were we?
translation.ko: 여기서 통신 기기가 통할 거라고 생각한 건 아니죠?

translation.en: There's been three years of expeditions and three years of radio silence.
translation.ko: 3년간 탐사팀을 보냈는데 3년 내내 라디오 수신 하나 없었어요

translation.en: Let's pack up and get moving.
We've already lost a lot of the day.
[Anya] Oh, I'm gonna check this out. Get us out of this damn swamp.
translation.ko: 이거 타고 나갈 수 있는지 확인해 볼게요

translation.en: [Ventress] All right. Let's check out the hut.
Looks like someone's about to have a wedding.
To look at them, you wouldn't say that they're the same species.
But they're growing from the same branch structure...
translation.ko: 하지만 같은 가지 구조에서 자라나고 있어요

translation.en: so it has to be the same species.
It's like they're stuck in a continuous mutation.
translation.ko: 마치 연속적인 돌연변이에 갇힌 것 같아요

translation.en: you'd sure as hell call it a pathology if you saw this in a human.
translation.ko: 이걸 사람한테서 발견했다면 매우 병적이라고 했겠죠

translation.en: No. It's been long abandoned, maybe even before--
-[Lena] Help me with her! -[Anya] What's going on?
[Anya] Let's sit you down. Help me with her bag.
Okay, just breathe. It's okay. You're just fine.
-What the hell happened? -Something in the water.
translation.ko: - 도대체 무슨 일이죠? - 물 속에 뭔가 있었어요

translation.en: It's exactly the same as the flowers.
Something here is making giant waves in the gene pool.
translation.ko: 무언가가 유전자 풀에 영향을 미치고 있는 게 틀림없어요

translation.en: Sharks have teeth like that, don't they?
Do you think it's a crossbreed?
You can't crossbreed between different species.
translation.ko: 서로 다른 종을 교배할 수는 없어요

translation.en: The mutations were subtle at first.
More extreme as we grew closer to the lighthouse.
Is it possible these were hallucinations?
But they were shared among all of us.
[clicks tongue] Must have gotten that from the gator.
So, where'd you learn to shoot?
I was in the military before I was an academic.
translation.ko: 학계에 발 들이기 전에 군대에 있었어요

translation.en: Feels like a lifetime ago now.
All other lives feel like a lifetime ago.
We were kids, I was married.
Which do you carry around your neck? A husband or a child?
He was in the army, too. That's...
Guess there had to be something.
It's not exactly something you do if your life is in... perfect harmony.
translation.ko: 평탄한 삶을 두고 올만한 곳은 아니잖아요

translation.en: 'cause she doesn't want you to see the scars on her forearms.
No, I think the opposite, trying to feel alive.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 오히려 살아있음을 느끼고 싶었던 것 같아요

translation.en: Yeah. As far as anyone knows...
no friends, no family, no partner, no children.
No concession in her at all.
In a way, it's two bereavements.
translation.ko: 어떻게 보면 사별을 두 번 한 거죠

translation.en: and the person I once was.
This used to be the headquarters of the Southern Reach.
Is that the old mess hall?
There's beds and bags. You think people are here?
Yeah, I'm gonna go with the past tense.
This shit is heavy. Can't carry this.
Lena, what you got going on?
Those were the soldiers on the last expedition.
Looks like they were using this room as their base of operations.
Why are some of the names crossed out?
-This is a plan view of the base, right? -[Cassie] Yep. This is the mess hall.
translation.ko: - 이게 기지 평면도죠? - 맞아요 여기가 식당이고요

translation.en: I think that the times by the names are a guard rota, so...
translation.ko: 이름 옆에 적힌 시간은 보초 순번인 것 같아요

translation.en: if they were guarding the perimeter, we should.
translation.ko: 그들이 보초를 섰다면 우리도 하는 게 좋을 거예요

translation.en: This might be able to tell us something.
translation.ko: 이걸 보면 뭔가 알 수 있을 것 같네요

translation.en: I should be able to play this.
Okay, so we know what happened to the last group. They went insane.
translation.ko: 지난번 사람들은 미쳐 버린 거로 판명 났네요
그 남자 안에 뭔가 살아 움직였어요

translation.en: -That was a trick of the light. -[Cassie] What?
translation.ko: - 아니, 불빛에 잘못 비친 거예요 - 뭐라고요?

translation.en: [Anya] I've been a paramedic for 10 years. I've scraped people off the road.
translation.ko: 응급 구조사만 10년 했어요 길바닥에서 사람 여럿 구조해 봤다고요

translation.en: You see some weird shit. That was a trick of the light.
translation.ko: 이상한 거 많이 봐서 알아요 불빛에 잘못 반사된 거예요

translation.en: -[Josie] His insides were moving. -[Anya] No, it was shock.
translation.ko: - 안에 있는 게 움직였다고요 - 그저 쇼크 증상이에요, 라덱

translation.en: -That was a shock response. -[Cassie] Watch it again.
[Anya] No, I'm not gonna watch it again!
[Cassie] That was not intestines. It was a worm--
translation.ko: 창자가 아니었어요 - 무슨 벌레 같은... - 그럼 혼자 보든가요, 셰퍼드!

translation.en: [Anya] Okay, then you watch it, Sheppard!
translation.ko: - 무슨 벌레 같은... - 그럼 혼자 보든가요, 셰퍼드!

translation.en: -I don't want to stay here tonight. -We don't have a choice.
translation.ko: - 오늘 여기 있고 싶지 않아요 - 선택의 여지가 없어요

translation.en: It's too late in the day for us to move on.
I gotta leave a day early.
But we had a whole day planned.
-We were gonna drive to the country-- -No, we can't.
It's good Josie's getting some rest.
With the help of a little sedative.
How about you? Get some sleep?
I'm at least as freaked as Josie.
What're you doing up? Not supposed to relieve me until 3:00.
I'm done sleeping for the night.
Okay, this is where we are...
It's a small community we evacuated two years ago.
I think we should head there tomorrow,
and then head out for the coast the following morning.
you didn't tell the team about your connection to Kane,
translation.ko: 케인과의 관계를 밝히지 않겠다고 했을 때

translation.en: I wasn't sure if that was a good idea.
I'm not sure how they would have reacted to you.
translation.ko: 만약 알았다면 다들 어떤 반응을 보였을지 모르겠더라고요

translation.en: Why did my husband volunteer for a suicide mission?
translation.ko: 제 남편이 자살 임무에 지원한 이유가 뭔가요?

translation.en: Is that what you think we're doing?

translation.ko: - 자살 행위라고? - 그 사람 프로파일링도 하고

translation.en: So you're asking me as a psychologist.
I'd say you're confusing suicide with self-destruction.
translation.ko: 당신은 자살과 자멸을 혼동하고 있는 것 같네요

translation.en: Almost none of us commit suicide...
and almost all of us self-destruct.
In some way, in some part of our lives.
In fact, you're probably better equipped to explain this than I am.
translation.ko: 본인이 더 잘 알지 않나요? - 나보다는 - 무슨 말씀이시죠?

translation.en: Wake up, Josie, come on. Wake up. Something's happening.
[Cassie] What happened? I heard a noise.
-Through the fence? -It's ripped open like a fucking zipper.

translation.ko: - 아무것도 안 보여요 - 나도 안 보여요

translation.en: Sheppard was next to me. Something took her.
translation.ko: 셰퍼드가 옆에 있었는데 뭔가 와서 데려갔어요

translation.en: -[Cassie continues screaming] -Oh, fuck! Oh, fuck! Sheppard!
-We have to go back now. -[Anya] She's right.
-[sighs] -[Anya] We lost one of our own.
We have evidence the previous team went nuts and chopped each other up.
translation.ko: 지난번 팀은 결국 미쳐서 서로 난도질했던 증거도 있고요

translation.en: I really don't know how much more right she has to be.
We still don't understand the cause or the nature of the Shimmer.
We have data, observations, photographs. She has hella footage.
translation.ko: 데이터, 관찰지, 사진이 있고 동영상도 엄청 찍었어요

translation.en: All of which makes the phenomenon less explicable, not more.
translation.ko: 그래서 더 복잡해졌지 명백해진 것은 없어요

translation.en: I'm gonna get to the lighthouse,
and I'm fine going on my own.
You just need to decide... whether you're coming with me or not.
translation.ko: 같이 올 건지 말 건지 결정해요

translation.en: It's like she hasn't noticed that Sheppard is dead.
translation.ko: 셰퍼드가 죽은 건 보이지도 않나 봐요

translation.en: You know, and thanks for the fucking backup, Lena.
-I didn't realize there were sides. -[Anya] Yeah.
Okay, then I agree with you. We should go back.
Good. Okay, great. There we go. Okay?
-So the three of us can-- -[Lena] Hold on a minute.
But it took us, what, six days to get here?
And the coast is two days away.
when we get to the coast, we can follow it until the perimeter wall.
You're saying we get out by going deeper?
This isn't some bullshit tactic to get us to the lighthouse, is it?
translation.ko: 우리를 등대로 끌고 가려는 수작 아니죠?

translation.en: This is not about the lighthouse, okay?
I believe that the coast is the best route out.
I didn't know what going back meant.
Why it would be safer than going forward.
translation.ko: 전진하는 것보다 안전하다고 확신할 수 없었죠

translation.en: [man] You didn't know, but you made a decision to continue as if you did.
translation.ko: 잘 모르면서 아는 것처럼 결정하고 행동했네요

translation.en: [man] Ventress had cancer. She was never coming back.
translation.ko: 벤트레스는 암 환자였어요 돌아올 생각이 없었죠

translation.en: Fine. Just... leave me the fuck alone.
It's another two hours' walk up the coast.
At first I thought the radio waves were blocked by the Shimmer,
translation.ko: 처음에는 쉬머에서 라디오파를 차단하는 줄 알았어요

translation.en: and that's why no one inside could communicate with base or GPS,
translation.ko: 그래서 안에서 바깥 기지나 위성으로 연락할 수 없다고요

translation.en: but the light waves aren't blocked, they're refracted, and...
translation.ko: 그런데 광파는 차단되는 게 아니라 굴절되고 있어요

translation.en: know what you'd get if you sequenced it?
translation.ko: 그거 염기서열 분석하면 뭐가 되는지 알아요?

translation.en: Hox? What is-- What's Hox mean?
They're the genes that define the body plan, the physical structure.
translation.ko: 체제, 그러니까 물리적 조직을 정의하는 유전자예요

translation.en: And the plants have human body plan.
Arms attached to shoulders. Legs to hips.
translation.ko: 팔은 어깨에 붙어 있고 다리는 골반에

translation.en: The Shimmer is a prism, but it refracts everything.
translation.ko: 쉬머는 프리즘 역할을 하고 모든 것을 굴절시키고 있어요

translation.en: Not just light and radio waves.
All right... I guess this is a bedroom.
You spend more time away from your husband than with him.
translation.ko: 남편과 함께 보내는 시간보다 떨어져 있는 시간이 많아요

translation.en: You can't talk to him about work, and he won't talk to you about his.
translation.ko: 일에 대한 얘기도 못 하고 그 사람도 일 얘기를 안 하죠

translation.en: And there is a clear physical and intellectual connection between us.
translation.ko: 우리는 육체적으로 지적으로 통하는 게 있어요

translation.en: -Have I covered the bases? -You forgot your wife.
translation.ko: 빠트린 것 있나요? - 당신 아내요 - 아내를 사랑해요

translation.en: You think that something may have happened to him?
translation.ko: 그 사람한테 무슨 일이라도 생겼다고 생각하는 거예요?

translation.en: You think somehow he's found out about our affair.
I'm not interested in talking... or in anything you have to say.
translation.ko: 얘기하고 싶지 않고 당신 말에 관심 없어요

translation.en: Just get dressed and get out.
You know, it's not me you hate, it's yourself.
translation.ko: 당신이 증오하는 건 내가 아니라 당신 자신이에요

translation.en: You don't get to ask that fucking question. You answer it!
translation.ko: 넌 질문 끝이야 이제 대답만 하라고!

translation.en: -[Anya] Why didn't you tell us? -[speaks indistinctly]
There are two theories of what went wrong.
translation.ko: 쉬머에서 잘못되는 이유에 두 가지 이론이 있었지

translation.en: One is that something in here killed them.
translation.ko: 첫째는 여기 있는 무언가가 다 죽였거나

translation.en: Two... is that they went crazy and they killed each other.
Josie nearly got killed by an alligator,
and Cass did get killed by a bear. [voice breaks]
So, yes, theory one, it fits.
translation.ko: 그러니까 첫 번째 이론이 맞긴 하네

translation.en: I didn't actually see a bear.
[Anya] The only people who saw were Lena and Ventress.
translation.ko: 곰을 본 사람은 리나와 벤트레스 둘뿐인데

translation.en: So nothing's confirmed. Everything's on their word.
translation.ko: 확증이 없어 둘 말을 믿어야 하는데 리나 말을 믿어야 하는데
둘 말을 믿어야 하는데 리나 말을 믿어야 하는데

translation.en: is that Lena... is a liar.
Or do you think I've lost my shit and we're gonna fuck each other up?
translation.ko: 아니면 내가 미쳐서 다들 죽여버릴 거라고 생각하는 건가?

translation.en: When I look at my hands...
and you tie me to a chair and cut me open...
translation.ko: 날 의자에 묶어서 내 배를 갈랐을 때

translation.en: are my insides gonna move like my fingerprints?
But... I'm not the one tied to a chair.
translation.ko: 하지만 의자에 묶여 있는 건 내가 아니지

translation.en: -You said she was dead. -[Lena speaks indistinctly]
[in Cassie's voice] Help me! Help me!
-It's not even light yet. -I don't have time to wait.
translation.ko: - 아직 동트기 전이에요 - 지체할 시간이 없어요

translation.en: Our bodies as fast as our minds. Can't you feel it?
It's like the onset of dementia.
If I don't reach the lighthouse soon...
the person that started this journey won't be the person that ends it.
translation.ko: 이 여정을 시작한 사람과 끝내는 사람은 다른 사람이겠죠

translation.en: I want to be the one that ends it.
How long was your husband in the Shimmer?
Theoretically, as long as a year.
That's a long time to be inside and remain intact.
translation.ko: 꽤 오랜 시간이네요 여기서 온전하게 있기에는

translation.en: I'm not so sure he was intact.
I checked my blood last night.
It will be in all of us.
Sheppard's voice in the mouth of that creature last night.
translation.ko: 어제 그 짐승의 입에서 셰퍼드의 목소리를 듣다니

translation.en: I think as she was dying, part of her mind became...
part of the creature that was killing her.
Imagine dying frightened and in pain,
and having that as the only part of you which survives.
I wouldn't like that at all.
But I don't think I want either of those things.
One by one, all gone, except you.
translation.ko: 한 명씩 당신만 빼고 다 사라졌네요

translation.en: Is it something I need to explain?
I'm not sure any of them did.
♪ You'll see something certain To tell you ♪
I thought I was a man.
And now I'm not so sure.
If I wasn't Kane, what was I?
You ever seen a phosphorus grenade go off? They're kind of bright.
translation.ko: 백린탄 터지는 거 본 적 있어요? 꽤 밝아요

translation.en: If you ever get out of here, you find Lena.
That I needed to know what was inside the lighthouse.
translation.ko: 등대 안에 있는 것이 뭔지 알아야겠다고 했죠

translation.en: I don't know what it wants.
will be fragmented into their smallest parts until...
translation.ko: 가장 작은 단위로 산산조각 날 거예요 한 조각도 남지 않을 때까지

translation.en: I don't think it wanted anything.
I'm not sure it even knew I was there.
translation.ko: 제가 거기 있는 걸 알았는지조차 모르겠어요

translation.en: It came here for a reason.
It was mutating our environment, it was destroying everything.
translation.ko: 우리의 환경을 변형시키고 모든 것을 파괴했어요

translation.en: A team reached the lighthouse a few hours ago.
translation.ko: 우리 팀이 몇 시간 전 등대에 도착했어요

translation.en: If what you encountered was once alive...
Now will you tell me what happened to my husband?
translation.ko: 이제 제 남편이 어떻게 됐는지 알려주실 건가요?

translation.en: his blood pressure stabilized and his pulse rate started to rise.
translation.ko: 혈압이 안정되고 맥박 수가 오르기 시작했어요

translation.en: A few hours later, he was not only awake,

translation.ko: 물론 아직 격리 조치 중이긴 합니다
